snippet: Spike TV hit it big with “The Joe Schmo Show” 10 years ago, and though the premise was thought to be unrepeatable, it’s trying it again anyway.
abstract: Spike TV brings back The Joe Schmo Show, ambitious, elaborate parody of reality shows, built around conceit that a single contestant is asked to take part in outrageous stunts surrounded--unbeknown to him--by competitors who are all comedy actors; new series stars original host Ralph Garman.
lead_paragraph: Spike TV hit it big with “The Joe Schmo Show” 10 years ago, and though the premise was thought to be unrepeatable, it’s trying it again anyway.

headline.seo: ‘The Joe Schmo Show’ Returns to Spike
headline.main: Fool Me Once: Spike Brings Back a Reality ‘Classic’
headline.print_headline: Fool Me Once: Spike Brings Back A Reality ‘Classic’
